name: I 'Stache Reza Tee
description: Reza Rules. I love his style & his 'stache. And, I love that he's a prominent and proud gay-Iranian-American-Jewish-Mulsim! In honor of Reza — who is shattering stereotypes — I've designed this 'stachtastic t-shirt and will be donating 10% of the proceeds from its sale to the It Gets Better Project (www.itgetsbetter.org). Product Information: Tees are silk-screened with gold foil stamp in Downtown Los Angles on American Apparel shirts, also made in Downtown Los Angeles. Sizing Information: Standard, unisex American Apparel sizing Care Instructions: To keep your shirt shiny and new and to protect the gold foil stamp, wash tee inside out, with cold water, using a mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Lay flat, or line dry. For questions, request a different size/color, or for international shipping, please email info [at] welovereza [dot] com before you place an order. Thanks for buying and sharing!
